comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: LOC has a big file on the IMPERATOR: www.flickr.com/search/?q=imperator&w=8623220@N02

comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: you can see she is quite high in the water, at the end of the trip, light of coal and passengers.  She also appears to have her characteristic lean (she was also known as Limperator) later in her career her funnels would be shortened and thousands of tons of ballast concrete added.
